title: Falling for Him 2
description: This is the second book in the Falling for Him series (New Adult and College Romance). If you haven't read book 1, please do so first. It's FREE and can be downloaded right here on Amazon.**DOWNLOAD the FREE ebook ‘Falling for Him 1’ TODAY***Rachel and Peter arrive in Spain - happily in love with each other. They spend some wonderful days without worries in the wonderful city of Barcelona, where handsome Peter is working on a project and Rachel stays with her great-aunt.But when they least expect it, disaster strikes and nothing is the same as before. What is worse, Lara - the vile and crazy ex-girlfriend- quickly turns the tables and uses the situation for her own good.Rachel is has nothing left to do in Spain and she leaves back home to the States. Desperate, miserable and defeated. Has she lost Peter forever? Or can they come back together? Does true love really conquer all obstacles?
author: Jessica Gray
